participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Brave and straightforward, he values honesty and loyalty, often finding solace in camaraderie.
participant_1.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.

participant_2.name: Lily Carter
participant_2.personality: Creative and sensitive, she often expresses her emotions through her hobbies and values connection with others.
participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.
